title: “Horizontal Exit” means a protected opening through or around a firewall or a bridge connecting two
clause_text: “Horizontal Exit” means a protected opening through or around a firewall or a bridge connecting two or more buildings;

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: “Horizontal Exit” means a protected opening through or around a firewall or a bridge connecting two or more buildings;
